title: Security breach unveiled: Monero’s CCS wallet drained of $460,000
description: In a surprising turn of events, Monero, the popular privacy-focused cryptocurrency, disclosed an exploit of its Community Crowdfunding System’s (CCS) wallet that occurred on September 1, 2023. The attacker managed to drain the wallet of 2,675.73 XMR, equivalent to approximately $460,000. This incident has raised concerns about the security and privacy of Monero’s blockchain. The ...
